recipesJson.description: so i mixed golden snzzberry custard by the diy_discord and it just honestly did not push enough flavor for me at all it was a good idea and I could tell it had very much potential so I pushed a few flavors up and added some sweetener and now itâ€™s phenomenal. so most of this credit goes to the DIY_DISCORD on alltheflavors.com .
